room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Cove" by PA Escape Rooms in Scranton
review: Great time today! We got out of the pirate room! Our gamemaster was awesome. Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Cove" by PA Escape Rooms in Scranton
review: A very nice escape room with well-crafted puzzles! Decor in Pirate's Cove is very well done and presents nicely when you first enter your adventure. Teresa did a great job helping us through our experience when we occasionally got stuck. A great family-friendly experience. We will be back!
